name: ep_scrollto
description: Scroll to a specific line number based on a parameter of lineNumber in the URL IE http://test.com/p/foo#lineNumber=10 -- Users can click on the line number to get a link
readme:
# ep_scrollto

scrollto client inside your Etherpad page, just for fun.

## How to use

* Really?

## Set as disabled by default (not available yet)

1. Open `settings.json`
2. Append:
   `"ep_scrollto" : {
      "disabled_by_default" : true
    }
   `

## Change the default scrollto channels (not available yet)

I'm available as a gun for hire.
